thread.title: BRIEF-Siam Commercial Bank and Prudential Thailand Sign Unit-Linked Bancassurance Partnership

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Siam Commercial Bank and Prudential Thailand Sign Unit-Linked Bancassurance Partnership

organizations.name: prudential thailand sign unit-linked bancassurance partnership

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Prudential Plc:
* SIAM COMMERCIAL BANK- HAS SGREED WITH PRUDENTIAL LIFE ASSURANCE AGREED TO ESTABLISH A BANCASSURANCE PARTNERSHIP
* SIAM COMMERCIAL BANK- PARTNERSHIP TO JOINTLY DEVELOP AND PROVIDE INSURANCE SOLUTIONS FOR SCBâ€˜S WEALTH SEGMENT CUSTOMERS
* SIAM COMMERCIAL BANK- SCB AND PRUDENTIAL THAILAND WILL INITIALLY OFFER THREE-UNIT LINKED PRODUCTS WITH BOTH REGULAR AND SINGLE PREMIUM OPTIONS
